sn1.26:1.1: “How many sources of light are in the world
sn1.26:1.2: By means of which the world is illumined?
sn1.26:1.3: We have come to ask the Blessed One this:
sn1.26:1.4: How are we to understand it?”
sn1.26:2.1: “There are four sources of light in the world;
sn1.26:2.2: A fifth one is not found here.
sn1.26:3.1: And fire, both by day and at night,
sn1.26:3.3: But the Buddha is the best of those that shine:
